name: 英語閱讀與寫作
comment: 進階英語課程，供非英語系同學選修
description: 透過廣泛性閱讀活動增進學生英語字彙量以及對各類型文章的鑑賞、分析及擷取重要資訊的能力；並透過各式寫作活動，培養學生用英文寫出自己想法的能力。

提昇學生英語文進階溝通能力及文學素養。
syllabus:
English Reading & Writing  
  
  
教學目標:  
Course description:  
This course is intended to integrate reading strategies and writing skills and thus to enable students to write coherent paragraphs. Reading materials on different topics are presented as models to familiarize students with basic elements in the composition of an article, such as vocabulary and idioms, sentence grammar and textual structures. Outside readings related to the textbook are also encouraged. After in-class discussion of the reading materials, paragraph writing practice will follow, focusing especially on how to write an appropriate topic sentence, how to support the topic sentence with examples, details, anecdotes, facts, etc. and how to develop ideas in a logical order. Summary writing is included to shorten the gap between reading and writing. Bi-weekly journal writing is also required so that students can practice writing regularly.

方法評量:  
Grading Policy:  
1\. Attendance & Participation – 20%  
2\. In-class Writing & Peer-work – 20%  
a. 4-5 times for this semester  
b. To write articles based on the genre & topic of the week (Draft 1).  
c. Peer-review, Discussion, & Revision (Draft 2)  
d. Upload the file to be evaluated and then revise again (Final Draft)  
3\. Chapter Presentation – 10%  
4\. Midterm – 20%  
5\. Final Project – 30%
